Message.Title: Fun Fridays and bad news...
Message.Msg: ... My, oh my, another forlorn Friday night locked away in a cubicle. Nice life! I DO see why you’re puttin’ in overtime, however – it’s called desperation. As of yesterday, according to Yahoo, voting prediction percentages for the candidates are as follows (their election model combines polling, prediction markets and historical data). Oh, wait, do you far-right folks count Yahoo among that horrible Main Stream Media that you mistrust and abhor? If you do, who do you spend so much time here? Well, here’s their analysis, and, frankly, kids, it doesn’t look good for you. So gear up, create another alias, have another jolt cola, and fire away more misspelled tales of indignation and phony patriotism. Assuming the other states go as predicted, the race will come down to these key, swing states. For Romney to win, he’ll have to win Florida, Virginia and Ohio, PLUS one other state. I’ll give you Florida. Virginia…possibly. You can do the math. Game over. But keep pluggin’ away here, day after day, alias after alias, mindless messages of hate and fear after mindless message of intolerance and obstructionism. As witnessed by your silly posts from 9 to midnight last night, you apparently have no friends, no life and no place else to go, anyhow. Unfortunately, the one percenters, whose message you are being duped into forwarding, are not in their basements on a Friday night pounding out propaganda like you are. Key Swing States Colorado Obama – 62% Romney – 38% Florida Romney – 62% Obama – 38% Iowa Obama – 55% Romney – 45% Nevada Obama – 73% Romney - 27% New Hampshire Obama – 54% Romney – 45% Ohio Obama - 54% Romney – 46% Virginia Obama – 50.5% Romney – 49.5% Wisconsin Obama - 71% Romney – 29%

Topic.Title: SSA orders ammo why?

Message.Msg: I have heard that it is preparing for what might happen if the new voter id laws get American Voters in an uproar. We have a black Pesident that many want to not have a second term, and on the other hand a man with money hidden all over the World. He and his wife they do not know what they have. Many want to see Obama's birth certificate, also many want to see Romney's tax returns. The GOP is scaring people about their future. The terrorist will get us, Social Security, and Medicare will be broke in a few years. Obama's people say the other are lieing, both sides causing the pot of humanity to start to boil. They are being battered with all these negatives, that a revolution of sort may occur. I hope some of these bullets are rubber bullets. Why, because after I served a year in Vietnam, and was trained for riot control. The year was the Spring of 68, a year before that were the riots in Detroit. People were selected as sniper. Other basic riot control with loaded weapons, and fixed bayonets. The need for this never occured Thanks be to God.

We need a multiple spearheaded approach to solve the problem of a World's increasing demand on petro-chemicals. Solar, wind, chemical, tidal, and hydro-electric.

Topic.Title: Barry Ready to Use Oil Reserve

Message.Msg: Hey, he might even approve a pipeline or two. He can always change his mind later. Anything Barry can take credit for, right before the election. Interestingly, Rick Edelman, said today that the stock market has done pretty well under Obama. He doesn't want to take credit for it though. Why? It runs counter to his anti 1%, anti Wall Street spiel. Rick's protege, also said after the 2008 meltdown, stocks had no way to go but up. But Rick said something that really makes sense. It might have been a slip up. He said one thing for sure however, if Barry gets a 2nd term. You can be sure, TAXES WILL BE GOING UP UNDER OBAMA! Enough said, if you are an investor, I say just say no to Barry. Anyone but. Remember, Ryan is an economist, and Mitt a businessman. Whereas Barry is trying to redistribute the investor's welth. So, say good bye to Barry. Regime change is just weeks away.

Message.Title: Our Place in Space Under Obama.
Message.Msg: There isn't one. We have to pay the Russians now to get our people into space. We are loosing our can do attitude, under Obama. We can't continue to be an innovative society, while allowing illegal immigration to turn us into a 3rd World Country. All the innovations brought to us by the space technology. GPS, weather forecasting, or the nano technology, that's driving the electronics of today, is at risk. I hope the people who worked in the space program, and their families vote this Socialist President out of office. Florida, we need you in the Republican column.

Message.Title: re - SSA orders ammo why?...
Message.Msg: ... “Mmm, that our Gov't (sic) would feel the need to re-arm itself, from fear of it's (sic) own citizens “ (sic) Jon, I don’t claim to be an English Professor or anything, but I’d be willing to bet that what you’ve got going on up there, in addition to your normal spelling incompetence, is that you created the first half of a sv clause (subject-verb clause), at which point you apparently nodded off. Would you like to buy a verb? Despite your narcolepsy, I’d like to inquire as to what country you live in. Here in ours, the politicians comprising the duly elected Government ARE the citizens. None of them are perfect, but we do our best to ensure fair elections in accordance with our doctrine of one person, one vote, with the majority ruling (except for that pesky Electoral College). We then accept those results and try to work together for the benefit of all. Oh, and while it hasn’t always been this way, nowadays we encourage ALL citizens to be involved in the election process and we don’t put hurdles in the way to restrict certain blocks of voters’ ease of access to the polls. How’s it work where you live – poll taxes, literacy tests and documentation harassment, or something like armed insurrection, which you seem to be advocating and encouraging?
